description: A modern look plus the hardworking details you need from climbing to the conference room, their Stretch Zion Slim Pant II has your back. Made with ReZion™, the more Earth-friendly evolution of their bestselling performance fabric, you can adventure confidently knowing there are over two decades of tried and trusted durability backing you up.
name: Prana Stretch Zion Slim Pants II, 32" Inseam - Mens
